entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installation success screen for Windows x86 SDK installer shows wrong installation path #11713
  • Please provide patch-agnostic URLs for runtime downloads #11040
  • winget install -e --install Microsoft.dotnet -v 5.0.303 - No version found matching: 5.0.303 #11548
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #installer-102496-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #11584
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-installer-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #installer-102457-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #11587
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #installer-103284-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #11635

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the main builds to the installer table. #11712
  • [ArPow] Update source-build commit shas #11710
  • [ArPow] Update previous source-built #11705
  • Update Xamarin manifests for .NET 6 rc 1: part 2 #11702

Updated

  • [ArPow] Reduce the size of the tarball. #11662
  • [ArPow] Add Microsoft.Deployment.DotNet.Releases to tarball #11623
